111.content:
https://www.playmobil.de/bauarbeiter/311...
This will be our hero and main character of the little story I want to establish here.
His name is Marc and he is 16 years old and starting a traineeship at a well know local construction company. He has finished basic school, not because he might not be intelligent or not having the brains, but he is just a lacy guy and his parents don’t care to much for him.
Anyhow he is happy to have his first day at the construction, where the build a new school house.
He meets his boss, foreman John Meyers:
https://www.playmobil.de/bauarbeiter/311...
Since both of them have brooms they have to clean the road where some truck has lost some dirt…
https://www.playmobil.de/bau---truck/320...
Suddenly something unexpected happened?
111.title: on a construction

1112.content:
https://www.playmobil.de/hochbauarbeiter...

It is Alfred, on older guy and he tries to influence the younger ones, especially Marc. He offers Marc a bottle of beer. Can Marc resist?
1112.title: offer of some beer

https://www.playmobil.de/baustellwagen-m...

https://www.playmobil.de/mann-mit-zylind...

https://www.playmobil.de/polizei---auto/...

1132122.content:
Police has to investigate about some explosion at school. A young ambitioned teacher tried to entertain her students on the last day before summer vacation has started. She performed some chemistry experiment, which backfire and burned her head and upper body. Currently she is in hospital and should not be disturbed. But officer James Jamerson has the task to go onside to school and see for evidence and maybe later ask some students about the incident.
Currently at school they start a huge construction for renewing some parts of the old building, which has a long-time back tradition here. They even say that some famous persons were attending the school in the founder years, but this is something for history, not for current investigations James has on his tasks.
He will have to meet the principal to get inside the school, because officially it is closed for summer vacation.

12.content:
This could become part of the Playmo Story- please select

(construction)
I was to proud to run my own business. I am leading this construction company in Playmo City for the 5 generation now. Unfortunate my father died and that’s why now I am in charge and the CEO of this company. My name is Hermann, I am 46, have a daughter in teenage years. Sometimes I wonder how everything will continue, since my 13 year old daughter with starting puppetry had become a girly girl. I remember a few years back she was a tomboy and more a boy then a girl and she started to show interest into the construction business, but now since around 1 year all of this has gone and she magically became a girl, or what you wound see as a girl, having now long hair, wearing almost only skirts and dresses and much more of this stuff I have no clue about. Sometimes I wish I could understand her better….

(police)
I was proud to have my exam from police academy finally. Now I can call myself a police officer and got my first job assignment in Playmo City police department.
While my training in police academy I met a guy, who now joins the special forces or some agent like department. I wonder how he is doing, because on the weekend I will meet him, then we can exchange our experiences from the first days we had on the real job.
Tonight I came to the agreed place, a small pizza house downtown to meet him, but he was nowhere to be found, only a good looking woman sat on some table waving at me…..Who is she, I don’t know her and have never seen her before….

(Ambulance)
My name is Norman and I am starting today in Playmo City hospital as a doctor for special surgeries. Normally there should be an introduction to the team but there was an emergency coming in: Some teacher had a chemistry accident and was burned all over….

(Fire workers)
My name is Frank and I am starting today in Playmo City fire works department. I love my job to fight fire and save life. Normally there should be an introduction to the team but there was an emergency coming in: Some fire broke out on some farm nearby Playmo City.
So we rushed there and found quite a mess. At the moment the fire broke out in a small stable for the horses, there was a wedding ongoing. I learned that this place is quite popular and used for several events like weddings and more.

(misc.)
Playmo City has much to impress: A busy harbor since it is on the sea side. Also a nice beach comes along with that ( Story Line 5a)
Also the place is surrounded by mountains, there are quite some activities and nature. ( Story Line 5b)
Playmo City has an airport (story Line 5c) with international connections like for the USA (Story Line 5d)
And it has some quite interesting history going back into the 1900 years and knights…/more…

15221.content:
Currently there is a construction ongoing in Playmo City. On of the oldest construction companies, which is leaded by Hermann Harris in the 5 generation, has the order the renew the old school building during the summer holiday, which is a tight time frame, only 6 weeks, but so it can be guaranteed, that school business is not disturbed.
Hermann knows how important this is, since he has a 16-year-old daughter, who is attending this school. He had lost the really good connection to her during the last couple of years, it was so easy and they were one heart and soul while she was younger, but since she entered puberty she lost the connection to her beloved Dad, at least this is how it seemed.
Of course it had to do with the company of her Dad, she was a real girl and lady and could not imagine to sit on a construction machine or something like that, but she was also Hermann’s only child and her mother could not bear a second time, because of some medical issues and complications she had at her daughters birth…Hannah, which was her name, knew that deep inside her Dad always wished to have a boy, the boy she never could be for him…..

15531.content:
Currently there is a construction ongoing in Playmo City. On of the oldest construction companies, which is leaded by Hermann Harris in the 5 generation, has the order the renew the old school building during the summer holiday, which is a tight time frame, only 6 weeks, but so it can be guaranteed, that school business is not disturbed.
Hermann knows how important this is, since he has a 16-year-old daughter, who is attending this school. He had lost the really good connection to her during the last couple of years, it was so easy and they were one heart and soul while she was younger, but since she entered puberty she lost the connection to her beloved Dad, at least this is how it seemed.
Of course it had to do with the company of her Dad, she was a real girl and lady and could not imagine to sit on a construction machine or something like that, but she was also Hermann’s only child and her mother could not bear a second time, because of some medical issues and complications she had at her daughters birth…Hannah, which was her name, knew that deep inside her Dad always wished to have a boy, the boy she never could be for him…..

155312.content:
Hannah was a typical teenage girl living in a big house in one of the best areas of Playmo City. Her parents were quite well situated and since her Dad has a welln known and good running construction company, Hannah and her family could lead a good life.
She was still at school and her marks were quite good.
Currently there were summer vacations and she was not sure what to do today on such a perfect day, where the wheather is fine and Playmo City has many options, like the beach, like mountains, where she cloud try her new mountin bike or she could just hang around in town with her friends….
155312.title: more with Hannah

choices: more of the past of this school
15532.content:
Police has to investigate about some explosion at school. A young ambitioned teacher tried to entertain her students on the last day before summer vacation has started. She performed some chemistry experiment, which backfire and burned her head and upper body. Currently she is in hospital and should not be disturbed. But officer James Jamerson has the task to go onside to school and see for evidence and maybe later ask some students about the incident.
Currently at school they start a huge construction for renewing some parts of the old building, which has a long-time back tradition here. They even say that some famous persons were attending the school in the founder years, but this is something for history, not for current investigations James has on his tasks.
He will have to meet the principal to get inside the school, because officially it is closed for summer vacation.
